mapper.select: select a.idx, c.name as storeName, a.name, a.cnt, a.price, to_char(a.payment_date, 'yy/mm/dd HH24:mm:ss') as pdate, to_char(a.sdate, 'yy/mm/dd HH24:mm:ss') as sdate, to_char(a.edate, 'yy/mm/dd HH24:mm:ss') as edate, nvl(b.content, 0) as reviewstatus from reservation a join store c on a.storeid = c.storeid left join review b on a.idx = b.rs_idx where a.userid = #{userid} order by a.sdate
